title: RustFS - MinIO Alternative, High-Performance Distributed Storage
description: RustFS is a high-performance object storage developed in the popular and secure Rust language, open-source, and compatible with OSS. It is designed for cloud-native workloads such as AI, suitable for building private cloud storage, hybrid cloud storage, and distributed storage, serving as a domestic alternative to MinIO.
keywords: RustFS, MinIO, distributed storage, high performance, high security, high concurrency

hero.RustFS is developed with the popular and: RustFS is developed with the popular and secure Rust language, compatible with S3 protocol. Suitable for AI/ML and massive data storage, big data, internet, industrial and confidential storage scenarios. Nearly free to use. Follows Apache 2 license, supports domestic confidential equipment and systems.
hero.Trusted open source software, compatible: Trusted open source software, compatible with over 1500+ software protocols

features.RustFS leverages distributed architectur: RustFS leverages distributed architecture and object storage capabilities to provide exceptional performance for AI and advanced analytics workloads, supporting data scaling from TB to EB levels.
features.RustFS integrates with RustyVault to pro: RustFS integrates with RustyVault to provide high-performance object storage security encryption, supporting multiple encryption modes to ensure data security and transparency.
features.Object storage version control feature a: Object storage version control feature assigns unique identifiers to each object version, allowing users to access and manage historical versions through API or management interface.
features.RustFS system automatically balances nod: RustFS system automatically balances node load, ensures even data distribution, supports dynamic addition or removal of resources based on storage needs, achieving unlimited scaling.
features.Supports object locking mode, implementi: Supports object locking mode, implementing WORM (Write Once Read Many) functionality, preventing data from being modified or deleted within specified time ranges, ensuring data integrity.
features.Automatically creates multiple copies wh: Automatically creates multiple copies when objects are written and distributes them to different nodes, supporting both synchronous and asynchronous replication modes, providing high availability and disaster recovery capabilities.

getStarted.High security, high concurrency and ulti: High security, high concurrency and ultimate performance
getStarted.Over 100+ enterprise users have started: Over 100+ enterprise users have started using RustFS

multiCloud.Multi-cloud object storage allows enterp: Multi-cloud object storage allows enterprises to build AWS S3-compatible data infrastructure on any cloud. The result is a consistent, portable interface for data and applications - meaning you can run anywhere, from edge to public cloud, without changing a line of code.
multiCloud.RustFS is powered by Kubernetes and prov: RustFS is powered by Kubernetes and provides scalable, secure, S3-compatible object storage for every public cloud. Free yourself from vendor lock-in and treat clouds for what they are - commodity compute, network, and drives.
multiCloud.From OpenShift to Tanzu, RustFS is the o: From OpenShift to Tanzu, RustFS is the only object storage that is part of the infrastructure foundation of leading Kubernetes distributions. With its massive portfolio of integrated applications, RustFS completes the software-defined picture.
multiCloud.The complete RustFS multi-cloud storage: The complete RustFS multi-cloud storage binary is less than 100MB, capable of powering object storage anywhere - from ARM SOCs, 5G POPs, and edge cache devices to mini data centers. This is why RustFS dominates the edge storage market.

reviews.Exquisite service, professional team, pr: Exquisite service, professional team, providing you with the best service
